Summary: Object looked like a star that went from red to green.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Myrtle Beach
There were no other sightings in Myrtle Beach on or around November 10th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsObject looked like a blinking star. Took out my video camera and saw that it was not a star but was a pulsating object that flared up and down. A few times it looked like it would disappear but would then flare up and produce a red halo effect. At one point a flashing light flew away from it to the left at high speed. The following day I filmed an orb of light flying through the air A few days later I filmed two strange looking objects at night. One with three lights and one with two. They were definitely not airplanes or helicopters. I have video footage of all five objects and can be seen on youtube under alfie008.
